#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<time.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x);

int main()
{	
	int noOfTest;
	scanint(noOfTest);
        
	for(int i=0;i<noOfTest;++i)
	{
                bool status[1000]={0};
		int nVal,mVal;
		scanint(nVal);
		scanint(mVal);
		int arr[nVal];
		for(int j=0;j<nVal;++j)
		{
			scanint(arr[j]);
		}
	
		status[0]=true;
		for(int i=0;i<nVal;++i)
		{
                        if(arr[i] > 1000)continue;
			for(int j=1000;j>=0;--j)
                        {
                            if(status[j]) 
                            {
                                int y=j+arr[i];
                                if(y < 1000)
                                        status[y]=true;
                            }
                        }
		}
		if(status[mVal])
			printf("1\n");
		else
			printf("0\n");		
	}
        
    return 0;
}


void scanint(int &x)
{
	int flag=0;
	register int c = gc();
	if(c == '-') flag=1;
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
   	if(flag == 1)x=-x;
}
